text: The Winnipeg General Strike happened in March 1919 in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. Although many Canadian companies had enjoyed large profits during World War I, they had bad contracts, wages, and working conditions. Some protesters rioted. Category:1919 in North America Category:1910s in Canada Category:20th-century riots Category:1910s protests Category:Riots in Canada Category:Winnipeg
title: Winnipeg general strike
